attributes.action: Prevent Tony Blair becoming President of Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are a very patient nation. In the main we were willing to wait politely until Tony Blair left office. We then breathed a sigh of relief and forgot all about him. If he makes attempts to become president it would be a bit rude, frankly, and besides he's not very good at that sort of thing.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
